title: Strengthening Leadership Practice Competencies: Simulation-Based Learning Experience (LX) Designer Skill Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design principles and digital tool implementation experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Analyze job requirements for LX designers across various industries with 80% accuracy
Apply a three-stage or more learning experience design process in VR simulation environments to improve real-world cases
Submit a comparative portfolio evaluating core competencies (technical and soft skills) of LX designers across eight industries
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
